titles: Harvey Weinstein found guilty in second sex crimes trial
descriptions: The 70-year-old is already serving 23 years in jail after he was convicted in New York two years ago.

titles: Panel calls for Trump to face insurrection charge
descriptions: The committee airs critical testimony by a Trump loyalist and criticises his daughter, Ivanka Trump.

titles: Ukraine to boost Belarus border defences as Putin meets Lukashenko
descriptions: Kyiv fears a fresh Russian assault is on the horizon after President Putin travelled to Minsk.

titles: Venezuelans ignore dangers of Dari√©n jungle
descriptions: A record number of people attempt the trek this year on foot in search of a better life in the US.

titles: In pictures: France receive heroes' welcome in Paris after World Cup heartbreak
descriptions: The French national team are met by thousands in Paris after losing to Argentina on Sunday.

titles: At Hanukkah event Biden slams 'venom' of antisemitism
descriptions: At the Jewish festival of lights, Mr Biden took a moment to slam a "venom" of hatred on the rise globally.

titles: Amber Heard settles defamation case against Johnny Depp
descriptions: Ms Heard will pay her ex-husband $1m after jury found she had defamed him in a Washington Post article.

titles: British Airways: Flights leaving US grounded over technical issue
descriptions: British Airways apologises to passengers left waiting in airports and on runways across the US.

titles: Elon Musk: Twitter users vote in favour of boss resigning
descriptions: Some 57.5% of users voted "yes" when Elon Musk asked them if he should quit as Twitter's chief executive.

titles: Vaughan condo shooting: Three victims were on condo board
descriptions: Police said the gunman, who lived in the building, killed five people in three separate units.

titles: Chaos as severe turbulence hits Hawaiian Airlines plane
descriptions: At least 36 people were injured, 11 seriously, during the passenger jet's flight to Honolulu.

titles: EU nations agree gas price cap to shield consumers
descriptions: The cap will kick in if prices breach 180 euros per megawatt hour for three days running.

titles: Fortnite settles child privacy and trickery claims
descriptions: Epic Games pays $520m over claims it violated child privacy laws and tricked players into making purchases.

titles: Ethiopia civil war: The boy named 'Wealthy' who weighs half what he should
descriptions: Ethiopia's civil war has left tens of thousands, including large numbers of children, malnourished.

titles: Poachers target hippos for giant teeth in place of ivory
descriptions: As bans on elephant ivory are tightened, poachers are killing hippos for their teeth, experts warn.

titles: 'We long for Ukraine - but our son has chances here'
descriptions: For some disabled refugees, fleeing Ukraine has given a better quality of life, provoking a dilemma.

titles: The cargo hauling aircraft with no pilots on board
descriptions: Rejecting deliveries to the doorstep, some drone makers are betting on bigger pilot-free aircraft.

titles: Explaining the criminal charges January 6 committee recommended for Trump
descriptions: The 6 January committee says there's enough evidence to prosecute the former president on four charges.

titles: Thailand warship capsizes during storm
descriptions: Video from the Thai Navy shows the ship on its side, as it is about to capsize.

titles: World Cup 2022: 'Argentina really needed this win'
descriptions: Victory in the 2022 World Cup has bought relief to many in a country facing continuing economic problems.

titles: German cathedral school allows girl choristers after 1,000 years
descriptions: In Germany, the Regensburg cathedral school has founded a separate girls choir.

titles: Ukrainians install Christmas 'tree of invincibility'
descriptions: The tree in Mykolaiv is made from camouflage nets which will be donated to soldiers in the new year.

titles: Peru-Bolivia border blocked by protesters
descriptions: Demonstrators have prevented travellers crossing a border between Peru and Bolivia, after protesting for early elections.

titles: Ukraine missile struck as mum sat with child to do homework
descriptions: Several people die after an attack on a residential building in the central Ukrainian city of Kryvyi Rih.
